core.transformation

Interface ITransformation<S,T>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - The type of the source element to transform.
    T - The type of the target element to obtain.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IAdaptation<S,T>, IConversion<S,T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAdaptation, AbstractConversion, AbstractNaryAssociationAdaptation, AbstractRelationshipWithAbstractMembersAdaptation, AbstractTransformation, AggregationToAssociationAdaptation, AssociationClassToConcreteClassAdaptation, AssociationClassWithAbstractMembersAdaptation, AssociationToRContextConversion, AssociationWithAbstractMembersAdaptation, BidirectionalAssociationToUnidirectionalAssociationsAdaptation, BooleanAttributeToFAttributeConversion, ClassToFContextConversion, CompositionToAssociationAdaptation, DependencyToAssociationAdaptation, DependencyWithAbstractMembersAdaptation, MultipleGeneralizationAdaptation, NaryAssociationMaterializationAdaptation, NaryAssociationToBinaryAssociationsAdaptation, SimpleGeneralizationAdaptation

    public interface ITransformation<S,T>
    an ITransformation generic interface defining an atomic transformation operation of a source element into a target element.

    This interface provides a generic transformation operation between model elements conforming to two random metamodels, or possibly the same metamodel.

    It must be implemented by all concrete atomic metamodeling transformation classes.
    Author:
    Bachar RIMA

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void apply(S source)
      Applies the pre-transformation, transformation, and post-transformation methods as they are defined by the transformation class implementing this interface
      S getSource()
      Returns this transformation's source
      T getTarget()
      Returns this transformation's target
      void postTransform(S source)
      Executes some post-transformation processing on the environment and state of the transformation class implementing this interface
      void preTransform(S source)
      Executes some pre-transformation processing on the environment and state of the transformation class implementing this interface
      void setSource(S source)
      Sets this transformation's source
      void setTarget(T target)
      Sets this transformation's target
      T transform(S source)
      Transforms a source model element conforming to a random metamodel into a target model element conforming to another random metamodel (possibly the same) in an atomic manner.
